name: Hydroponics
description:
Hydroponics is a short educational/interactive experience in hydroponic farming that can be used by hydroponic growers to inform people about their industry, and it may also be used as an educational tool for agricultural students seeking to learn about alternative forms of farming.

This is a brief collaboration between VEDX intern Michael Hammond and CTO Lance Powell. Model optimization and logo are by Gulsum Ferah. If you're interested in using this experience commercially, a donation is very welcome. If you'd like to see further development of this or related projects, please contact us through our website and we will meet your immersive education needs.
